definition: To temporarily transfer possession of an item or resource to someone else, typically with the understanding that it will be returned at a later time. This word is commonly used when referring to borrowing or lending objects, such as books, tools, or money.

examples.german: Kannst du mir bitte dein Buch leihen?
examples.english: Can you please lend me your book?

examples.german: Ich habe ihm mein Auto geliehen.
Kannst du mir etwas Geld leihen?
examples.english: Can you lend me some money?
